attributes.action: Treat delivery drivers with the respect they deserve
attributes.additional_details: Ensure that delivery drivers are allowed the essential services they need to continue to do their job
attributes.background: Delivery drivers all classes are an essential part of our country but they are finding it almost impossible to get food or have a shower sleeping in cabs night after night they need help and must be treated with the respect they deserve

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, most service stations are now providing access to showers and other facilities.

Decisions for individual service stations are for their operators, and not for the UK Government or Parliament.
